name: 2D Shooter (Intergalactic Frosting Fight)
description:
Modifications:

1. Reskinned player avatar to completely new character (hand drawn).

2. Reskinned enemies to completely new character (hand drawn).

3. Created a new level with new theme (Starberry) and background (hand drawn).

4. Reskinned menus including background and buttons (hand drawn).

5. Reskinned and reworked level select to fit theme - cake tiers (hand drawn). 

6. Added instructions with backstory.

7. Completely rethemed game and took time to come up with a creative and cohesive idea that I would enjoy. 

Credits:

Created by Erin Sawyer
